page.title: 02A day in my life
page.content:
It was a Saturday and I had come back from a camping trip. I had to do the washing! and ironing! I just remembered I had to go to the barber's appointment. I went to the shop. The lady wet my hair and I heard her cutting off my hair. I got out of the shop and did some shopping. I got home. I started on the washing. The electricity went. I put 50p in and the dog bit my leg. I did the washing and then I hung it on the line then I did the ironing. I had a wash and then went out at six o'clock. I went to a restaurant. I had wine and a hot Indian curry. I had more wine. I got home. I tidied up and washed up. I had a wash and got my book of jokes and read it until I fell asleep.
{a 9 year old boy from Chelmsley Wood}
